id: Steelers quarterback honors shooting victims with custom cleats
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Shelby Copeland, CNN Updated 6:12 PM ET, Sun November 4, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)The NFL's Pittsburgh Steelers paid tribute to the Tree of Life synagogue shooting victims with custom-made cleats. The cleats feature a modified version of the Steelers logo, with its yellow star substituted with the Jewish Star of David, and the phrase "Stronger Than Hate."  We are #StrongerThanHate.A post shared by  Pittsburgh Steelers (@steelers) on Nov 4, 2018 at 8:32am PSTBen Roethlisberger (@_BigBen7) wearing the #StrongerThanHate cleats pic.twitter.com/9IxPVz5S1bStatement from Steelers President Art Rooney II. pic.twitter.com/GFwFISshZd#NewProfilePic pic.twitter.com/PdO4z8ULS8
